```{r}
subtype_data <- dplyr::bind_cols(
  patient_data,
  results_cv_max$subtype_and_stage_table) |> 
  filter(ml_subtype != "Subtype 0")
```

```{r}
subtype_data |> 
  ggplot2::ggplot() + 
  aes(
    x = CGG,
    fill = Gender
  ) +
  geom_histogram(alpha = .4) +
  facet_wrap(~ml_subtype, ncol = 1) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```


```{r}
subtype_data |> 
  ggplot2::ggplot() + 
  aes(
    x = CGG,
    col = Gender,
    y = `Age at visit`
  ) +
  geom_point(alpha = .4) +
  facet_wrap(~ml_subtype, ncol = 1) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
